name: Download yesterday's performance data from LinkedIn Ads to a Microsoft Excel 365 workbook
description:
This template downloads LinkedIn Ads performance stats for yesterday into a Microsoft Excel 365 workbook.

The template is downloading this data:
Date, Account, Campaign, Impressions, Clicks, Costs, Conversions, Click Conversions, View Conversions

This means that you need to create a workbook with these columns BEFORE you start configuring the template. Once you have the workbook ready, you can start the template setup process.

The template is scheduled to run daily at 8 am.
